path: To Be Organized/Remote Support Documents/Telemetrics/Signing in to Telemetrics when kicked out.docx
text: When you log into the Telemetrics Robo controllers remotely, the local controller interface will log out while the remote user is operating it. So yes, someone can get kicked out of their controller by accident. It will look like this below: When this happens locally in 3S, the Ops must enter in the password “tele”, and it will bring them back to their normal interface. I put P-Touch labels on he units as well that note what to enter in if and when it happens.
